articles.description: England face Zimbabwe in a one-off Test at Trent Bridge - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs Zimbabwe LIVE: Test, Trent Bridge, day two - cricket score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: Former Brentford striker Ivan Toney earns England recall for next month's World Cup qualifier against Andorra and friendly Senegal.
articles.title: England squad: Ivan Toney recalled by Thomas Tuchel for Andorra and Senegal games matches

articles.description: Charles Leclerc sets the pace in first practice at the Monaco Grand Prix, despite consistently complaining about the behaviour of his Ferrari.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Charles Leclerc fastest in first practice despite collision with Lance Stroll

articles.description: England face West Indies in the second women's T20 at Hove - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Second women's T20, Hove - cricket score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: Follow build-up to Saturday's Women's Champions League final between Arsenal and Barcelona as Renee Slegers, Pere Romeu and players face the media.
articles.title: Women's Champions League final build-up: Arsenal & Barcelona press conferences

articles.description: The north London team are celebrating their first European trophy for 41 years with an open-top bus parade in the capital.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur to hold victory parade after Europa League triumph

articles.description: Novak Djokovic moves one win away from his 100th ATP Tour-level singles title with a hard-fought victory against Britain's Cameron Norrie.
articles.title: Geneva  Open: Novak Djokovic beats Cameron Norrie to reach final and close in on 100th title

articles.description: The Monaco Grand Prix will feature a mandatory two pit stops for every driver in an effort to make the race more unpredictable - but will it work?
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Will mandatory two pits stops 'spice it up a bit more'?

articles.description: If Sheffield United beat Sunderland on Saturday, the level of influence wielded by American investors in the Premier League will reach an unprecedented level, writes Dan Roan.
articles.title: How Championship play-off final could tighten US grip on Premier League

articles.description: Manchester United are set to cut up to 200 jobs - after about 250 employees were made redundant last year.
articles.title: Man Utd tell staff of job losses in second round of redundancies
